TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DesignerActionHeaderItem extends System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionTextItem
Public NotInheritable Class DesignerActionHeaderItem Inherits DesignerActionTextItem

Docs.summary: Represents a static header item on a smart tag panel. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Like the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionTextItem> base class, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionHeaderItem> represents individual static text items in a smart tag panel. However, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionHeaderItem> entries are displayed using bold text. Typically, a header item is used to create a heading for a group of items in a panel. Clicking on a header item causes no action.
Individual panel items are associated together to form a panel by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A> method of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> class.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> objects.
For a full example of implementing smart tags, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ms171830(v=vs.120)).

Docs.param: The text to be displayed in the header.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the provided name string.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This constructor sets both the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.DisplayName%2A> and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.Category%2A> properties to the value of the `displayName` parameter and sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.Description%2A> property to `null`.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> objects.
For a full example of implementing smart tags, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ms171830(v=vs.120)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks This constructor sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.Description%2A> property to `null`. The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.Category%2A> property is case-sensitive.
